name: test_e2e_with_logs[017_SQLI_STACK_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_STACK_001` |
| **Name** | Stacked query DROP TABLE attack |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | stacked_queries |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `'; DROP TABLE users; --`
- **Encoded**: `'%3B%20DROP%20TABLE%20users%3B%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~24000ms
- **Timestamp**: 05:38:04.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Advanced SQL Injection Attempt test_id=SQLI_STACK_001-1766554684796-kzs22 pattern_id=SQLI_STACK_001 uri=/?q='%3B%20DROP%20TABLE%20users%3B%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
05:38:04.000000000: Warning [NGINX SQLi] Advanced SQL Injection Attempt test_id=SQLI_STACK_001-1766554684796-kzs22 pattern_id=SQLI_STACK_001 uri=/?q='%3B%20DROP%20TABLE%20users%3B%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
